title: Nico’s Cooking Class
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Nico-san, I brought the eggs. What should I do with them?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Alright, crack those eggs into a bowl, then stir them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I understand!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>....Nico-san, is this enough?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Hmm, it looks fine. All you have to do now is to season and fry it. Tamagoyaki is surprisingly simple, so I think even you can make it once you learn how, Setsuna.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Waaah, I’m so happy! I’ve always wanted to create a dish that I could call my specialty. I’ll do my best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yeah, as a school idol, it doesn’t hurt to be able to cook. Keep at it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Sheesh, I heard that Setsuna is a terrible cook, but she can do it if she tries. I was worried over nothing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>The seasoning should pack a punch to make it more filling, right.... Maybe some pepper and.... tabasco? Aaah, it might be better to add some protein to make it more nutritious....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
